articles.content: AUBURN, Alabama–After victories over Southeastern Louisiana and Florida State the Auburn will try to win its NCAA baseball regional on Sunday vs. the UCLA Bruins. The first pitch at Plainsman Park wa… [+2149 chars]

Wales secured a spot in the 2022 World Cup with a 1-0 win over Ukraine in Sunday's qualifying playoff.

articles.title: Source - San Francisco 49ers excuse Jimmy Garoppolo from mandatory minicamp - ESPN
articles.description: The 49ers have excused quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo from this week's mandatory minicamp, a source told ESPN, confirming a report by NFL Network.
